isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX 2150 - PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE - LUBRICATION

svcproc.title: LUBRICATION
svcproc.para: Every six months, 1800 operating hours or 50,000 miles, whichever occurs first, check external oil supply and return lines, if applicable, for kinks, bends, or restrictions to flow. Supply lines must be a minimum of 3/16" l.D. and return lines must be a minimum of 1/2" l.D. Oil return lines should slope as sharply as possible back to the engine crankcase and should have as few fittings and bends as possible. Refer to SPECIFICATIONS, for oil pressure minimum valves.
